name: MyTP Ski and Snowboard
description:
The One & Only mobile freeskiing and snowboarding game is now available for your desktop !!!

Now it doesn`t matter anymore if you prefer one or two planks - MyTP Ski & Snowboard leads you on the right track ! Featuring amazing slopes with a ton of kicker lines, boxes and rails… smooth & technical halfpipe riding… big air events… individual characters... a replay option and much more !

Learn new tricks, show your skills or ride wherever and whatever you want – from freeriding in the dreamland of Alaska, terrain parks in Southern California's Mountain High - USA, Flachauwinkl - Austria & LAAX - Switzerland, the road gap at the randerline session to the yooo.tv halfpipe BestTrick Session – MyTP Ski & Snowboard gives you all the possibilities.

You can play with your own “styled” character - select a jacket and take the skis or the board that meet your taste.
Your riding - your style ! 


*** FEATURES ***
- „realistic“ 3D graphics
- half pipes, kickers, rails and powder
- „real“ resorts
- events and sessions
- 8 individual male and female characters
- 36 levels
- 12 skis & 12 boards
- over 500 tricks
- „career" and „quick play" modes
- replay option
